body_html:
I can reproduce this on master:

import torch
sigma = torch.FloatTensor([[1, 20], [1, 100]])
torch.potrf(sigma) # Fails

 s =sigma.numpy()
import scipy.linalg.lapack
scipy.linalg.lapack.dpotrf(s)
(array([[   1.,   20.],
        [   0., -300.]]), 2)

assuming that torch.potrf and scipy.linalg.lapack.dpotrf do the same thing

body:
I can reproduce this on master:
```
import torch
sigma = torch.FloatTensor([[1, 20], [1, 100]])
torch.potrf(sigma) # Fails

 s =sigma.numpy()
import scipy.linalg.lapack
scipy.linalg.lapack.dpotrf(s)
(array([[   1.,   20.],
        [   0., -300.]]), 2)
```
assuming that torch.potrf and scipy.linalg.lapack.dpotrf do the same thing
